Package it.polimi.ingsw.resources

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Resource
    Resource is the interface for resources, including ChoiceResources
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ChoiceResource
    ChoiceResource represents a resource that can be spent or obtained, but the player has the choice to select such resource
    ChoiceSet
    ChoiceSet represents a set of resources to choose from
    FullChoiceSet
    FullChoiceSet is a ChoiceSet that allows to choose from all possible ConcreteResources
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    ConcreteResource
    ConcreteResource represents all possible in-game resources
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    InvalidChoiceSetException
    InvalidChoiceSetException is thrown when a null or empty ChoiceSet is trying to be used
    InvalidResourceException
    InvalidResourceException is thrown when a not valid resource is trying to get used
    NotConcreteException
    NotConcreteException is thrown when a ConcreteResource was expected
    NotEnoughResourcesException
    NotEnoughResourcesException is thrown when there are not enough resources to complete the action
